section.p:
An Immunization Activity describes immunization substance administrations that have actually occurred or are intended to occur. Immunization Activities in "INT" mood are reflections of immunizations a clinician intends a patient to receive. Immunization Activities in "EVN" mood reflect immunizations actually received.
An Immunization Activity is very similar to a Medication Activity with some key differentiators. The drug code system is constrained to CVX codes. Administration timing is less complex. Patient refusal reasons should be captured. All vaccines administered should be fully documented in the patient's permanent medical record. Healthcare providers who administer vaccines covered by the National Childhood Vaccine Injury Act are required to ensure that the permanent medical record of the recipient indicates:
1) Date of administration
2) Vaccine manufacturer
3) Vaccine lot number
4) Name and title of the person who administered the vaccine and the address of the clinic or facility where the permanent record will reside
5) Vaccine information statement (VIS)
a. Date printed on the VIS
b. Date VIS given to patient or parent/guardian.
This information should be included in an Immunization Activity when available. (Reference: http://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/pubs/pinkbook/downloads/appendices/D/vacc_admin.pdf)

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8828, CONF:1198-10498, CONF:1198-32528 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.52"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Immunization Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.52)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-8830)
Note: SubstanceAdministration.code is an optional field. Per HL7 Pharmacy Committee, "this is intended to further specify the nature of the substance administration act. To date the committee has made no use of this attribute". Because the type of substance administration is generally implicit in the routeCode, in the consumable participant, etc., the field is generally not used and there is no defined value set.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode="completed" (CONF:1198-8833), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32359)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1198-8838)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdministrableDrugForm 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14570 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8846)
contain zero or one [0..1] text

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31151)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8850, CONF:1198-15547)
Conforms to Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8853, CONF:1198-8854, CONF:1198-15537)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8856, CONF:1198-8857, CONF:1198-31392)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8860, CONF:1198-8861, CONF:1198-15539)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8863, CONF:1198-8864, CONF:1198-15540)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Dispense2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8866, CONF:1198-8867, CONF:1198-15541)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31510)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1198-31511)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1198-31512)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber (CONF:1198-31513)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] act, where its type is Substance Administered Act (CONF:1198-31514)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1198-8847)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Immunization Medication Information2 (CONF:1198-15546)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1198-8869)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1198-8870)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1198-15548)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1198-8858)
SHALL conform to Immunization Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.52)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8826, R2.1=CONF:1198-8826)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:8827, R2.1=CONF:1198-8827)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @negationInd (CONF:8985, R2.1=CONF:1198-8985)
Use negationInd="true" to indicate that the immunization was not given.
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8829, R2.1=CONF:1198-8829)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-8830)
Note: SubstanceAdministration.code is an optional field. Per HL7 Pharmacy Committee, "this is intended to further specify the nature of the substance administration act. To date the committee has made no use of this attribute". Because the type of substance administration is generally implicit in the routeCode, in the consumable participant, etc., the field is generally not used and there is no defined value set.
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode="completed" (CONF:1198-8833), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32359)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8834, R2.1=CONF:1198-8834)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1198-8838)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:8839, R2.1=CONF:1198-8839)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:8840, R2.1=CONF:1198-8840)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:8841, R2.1=CONF:1198-8841)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdministrableDrugForm 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14570 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8846)

MAY contain [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:8850, CONF:8851, CONF:15547)
Conforms to Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8988, CONF:8989, CONF:15542, R2.1=CONF:1198-8988, R2.1=CONF:1198-8989, R2.1=CONF:1198-15542)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Immunization Refusal Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.53)

SHOULD contain [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:8849, R2.1=CONF:1198-8849)
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31151)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8850, CONF:1198-15547)
Conforms to Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8853, CONF:1198-8854, CONF:1198-15537)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8856, CONF:1198-8857, CONF:1198-31392)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8860, CONF:1198-8861, CONF:1198-15539)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8863, CONF:1198-8864, CONF:1198-15540)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Dispense2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8866, CONF:1198-8867, CONF:1198-15541)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31510)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1198-31511)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1198-31512)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber (CONF:1198-31513)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] act, where its type is Substance Administered Act (CONF:1198-31514)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1198-8847)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Immunization Medication Information2 (CONF:1198-15546)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1198-8869)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1198-8870)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1198-15548)
This text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15543)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15544)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1. (CONF:15545)

doseQuantity, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UCUM Units of Measure (case sensitive) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:8842, R2.1=CONF:1198-8842)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:8858)
participant with target entry Drug Vehicle SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CSM" (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:8851, R2.1=CONF:1198-8851)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1198-8858)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10498 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.52"
Consol Immunization Activity This text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15543)
Consol Immunization Activity reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15544)
Consol Immunization Activity This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1. (CONF:15545)

Consol Immunization Activity doseQuantity, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UCUM Units of Measure (case sensitive) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:8842, R2.1=CONF:1198-8842)
Consol Immunization Activity entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:8858)

Consol Immunization Activity participant with target entry Drug Vehicle SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CSM" (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:8851, R2.1=CONF:1198-8851)
SHALL conform to CDA Substance Administration
Consol Immunization Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8826, R2.1=CONF:1198-8826)

Consol Immunization Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:8827, R2.1=CONF:1198-8827)
Consol Immunization Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @negationInd (CONF:8985, R2.1=CONF:1198-8985)
Consol Immunization Activity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8829, R2.1=CONF:1198-8829)
Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:8830)
Consol Immunization Activity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:8831)
Consol Immunization Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode="completed" (CONF:8833)
Consol Immunization Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8834, R2.1=CONF:1198-8834)
Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:8838)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:8839, R2.1=CONF:1198-8839)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:8840, R2.1=CONF:1198-8840)
Consol Immunization Activity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:8841, R2.1=CONF:1198-8841)
Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:8850, CONF:8851, CONF:15547) Conforms to Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8853, CONF:8854, CONF:15537) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8856, CONF:8857, CONF:15538) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8863, CONF:8864, CONF:15540) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Medication Dispense (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8866, CONF:8867, CONF:15541) Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS, and Conforms to Reaction Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8988, CONF:8989, CONF:15542, R2.1=CONF:1198-8988, R2.1=CONF:1198-8989, R2.1=CONF:1198-15542) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Immunization Refusal Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.53)
Consol Immunization Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable, where its type is Consumable (CONF:8847)

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode (CONF:8846), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Product Form Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.11 DYNAMIC
Consol Immunization Activity SHOULD contain [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:8849, R2.1=CONF:1198-8849) Conforms to Performer2 from CDA

Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8860, CONF:8861, CONF:15539) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Medication Supply Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)
Consol Immunization Activity MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition, where its type is Precondition (CONF:8869)
SHALL conform to CDA Consumable
Consol Consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Immunization Medication Information (CONF:15546)
SHALL conform to CDA Precondition
Consol Precondition SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:8870)
Consol Precondition SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration (CONF:15548)
